channel.title: warsteiner on Technical Solutions for the 10X Engineers
channel.description: Recent content in warsteiner on Technical Solutions for the 10X Engineers

item.title: Revolutionary Audio Streaming Solution using Warsteiner Technologies
item.description: Problem Statement Our company, Europe’s leading headset provider, has been facing a bottleneck issue in our audio streaming services. We have witnessed a huge spike in demand of our audio streaming platform due to increased virtual events and the current pandemic situation. Our existing infrastructure is unable to handle this sudden surge in traffic effectively. As a result, we have received numerous complaints from our clients regarding the frequent bufferings and reduced audio quality.
